tables.name: neutron_block_events
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive view of block events from the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the blockchain's activity over time. It includes essential metadata to contextualize each event.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block within the blockchain at the time of the event.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was committed to the blockchain.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the block.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes related to the event.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The source of the block event data.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to capture the event data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the event data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_blocks
tables.description: This table contains information about each block in the Cosmos ecosystem, including block height and timestamp, as well as details about the proposer and validators.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators that secured the block.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total size of the messages in the block in bytes.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The number of transactions in the block.

tables.name: neutron_delegate
tables.description: This table provides a detailed breakdown of token transactions on the Cosmos blockchain, enabling users to monitor the distribution and movement of tokens across the ecosystem. It offers insights into the activities of validators and the impact of their actions on token balances.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was mined

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator responsible for processing the transaction

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred in the transaction

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred (e.g., uatom, kusama)

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The new shares allocated to the validator as a result of the transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the data source

tables.name: neutron_dex_limit_order_cancel
tables.description: This table contains records of cancel limit orders from the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides a snapshot of the order cancellation activity on decentralized exchanges.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the order cancellation transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the order cancellation transaction was committed to the blockchain.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that initiated the order cancellation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that initiated the order cancellation.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that initiated the order cancellation.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the order cancellation.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account that received the order cancellation (in the case of a counterparty order cancellation).

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token being used for the order cancellation.

columns.name: token_amount_in_remaining
columns.description: The remaining amount of the token that was being used for the order cancellation.

columns.name: token_denom_out
columns.description: The denomination of the token that was being cancelled or released as a result of the order cancellation.

columns.name: token_amount_out
columns.description: The amount of the token that was cancelled or released as a result of the order cancellation.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: A unique identifier for the tranche associated with the order cancellation.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_limit_order_place
tables.description: This table contains data related to limit orders placed on decentralized exchanges within the Cosmos ecosystem, showcasing the details of these orders, including their status and associated fees.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that includes the limit order placement.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message (in this case, the limit order placement) within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the specific action (limit order placement) within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The wallet address of the sender who placed the limit order.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The wallet address that the limit order is intended for.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: Denomination of the token being sent (input) in the limit order.

columns.name: token_amount_in_total
columns.description: Total amount of the token being sent (input) in the limit order.

columns.name: token_amount_in_executed
columns.description: Amount of the token that has been executed (spent) in the limit order.

columns.name: token_amount_in_remaining
columns.description: Remaining amount of the token that has not been executed (spent) in the limit order.

columns.name: token_denom_out
columns.description: Denomination of the token being received (output) in the limit order.

columns.name: token_amount_out
columns.description: Amount of the token being received (output) in the limit order.

columns.name: limit_tick
columns.description: The price tick for the limit order.

columns.name: order_type
columns.description: Type of the limit order (e.g., buy or sell).

columns.name: min_avg_sell_price
columns.description: The minimum average price at which the limit order can be executed.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: Key identifying the specific tranche (a subset of orders) within the limit order.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee associated with the limit order placement.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_limit_order_withdraw
tables.description: This table contains records of Cosmos blockchain limit orders that have been withdrawn. It provides information on the sender, receiver, and token amounts for each withdrawal.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the limit order withdrawal transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the limit order withdrawal transaction was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that contains the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block that contains the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that contains the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that contains the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the receiver who received the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token being withdrawn from the limit order.

columns.name: token_amount_in_remaining
columns.description: The remaining amount of the token in the limit order after withdrawal.

columns.name: token_denom_out
columns.description: The denomination of the token being withdrawn from the limit order.

columns.name: token_amount_out
columns.description: The amount of the token withdrawn from the limit order.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: The unique key of the tranche that the limit order belongs to.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the limit order withdrawal data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_lp_deposit
tables.description: This table logs liquidity pool (LP) deposits from transactions on Cosmos-based blockchains, providing insight into asset distribution and market dynamics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account that received the assets or the liquidity pool.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_0
columns.description: The amount of the first token transferred.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_1
columns.description: The amount of the second token transferred.

columns.name: shares_minted
columns.description: The number of shares minted as a result of the LP deposit.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: Index of the tick in the market.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The transaction fee paid in the native coin of the blockchain.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_lp_withdraw
tables.description: This table provides data on liquidity pool withdrawals from the Cosmos ecosystem. It includes key information about the transactions, tokens, and fees involved in these withdrawals.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash identifying the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_0
columns.description: The amount of the first token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_1
columns.description: The amount of the second token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: shares_burnt
columns.description: The amount of shares burnt during the withdrawal.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: The index of the tick at which the withdrawal occurred.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee associated with the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_swap
tables.description: Cosmos Dex Swap Data, providing information on token swaps and transactions across the blockchain ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block number at which the transaction was executed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was executed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the swap.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the swap.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token being swapped into.

columns.name: reserves
columns.description: The current reserves of the tokens involved in the swap.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: The index of the tick within the tranches.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: The unique identifier for the tranche.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee associated with the swap transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_tick_update
tables.description: This table contains updates for tick and tranches of various tokens in the Cosmos ecosystem, helping track changes in token reserves and fees.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Hash of the transaction that triggered the tick update.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within the message.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: Denomination of the first token involved in the tick update.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: Denomination of the second token involved in the tick update.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: Denomination of the token involved in the update.

columns.name: reserves
columns.description: Reserves of the tokens involved in the update.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: Index of the tick update.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: Key of the tranches involved in the update.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Fee associated with the tick update.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested.

tables.name: neutron_dex_tranche_user_update
tables.description: This table provides information on the updates made to dex tranches in the Cosmos ecosystem. It includes details on block height, timestamp, and token transactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: A unique identifier for the tick in the transaction.

columns.name: shares_owned
columns.description: The number of shares owned by the account after the transaction.

columns.name: shares_burnt
columns.description: The number of shares burnt in the transaction.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: A unique identifier for the tranche involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_ics20_receive
tables.description: This table contains information about ICS-20 token reception events from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the flow of tokens between accounts.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the token reception event was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the token reception event was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction containing the token reception event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block containing the token reception event.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction containing the token reception event.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message containing the token reception event.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that sent the tokens in the token reception event.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the tokens in the token reception event.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens received in the token reception event.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens received in the token reception event.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of tokens received in the token reception event, indicating any intermediate tokens or denominations.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional memo or note associated with the token reception event.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel involved in the token reception event.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel involved in the token reception event.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection associated with the token reception event, indicating the source and destination ports.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the token reception event within the channel.

columns.name: ack
columns.description: Indicates whether the token reception event has been acknowledged.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the token reception event was ingested into the data system.

tables.name: neutron_ics20_transfer
tables.description: This table contains information about ICS-20 token transfer events in the Cosmos ecosystem, capturing senders, receivers, and token details. It provides a comprehensive view of token movements across the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transfer event occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction containing the transfer event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transfer event within the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the ICS-20 message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the ICS-20 message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address that initiated the token transfer.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address that received the token transfer.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the event.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of the tokens transferred (if applicable).

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information or memo associated with the transfer event.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the connection where the transfer occurred.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the connection where the transfer occurred.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection between the source and destination channels.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the transfer event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_ics_consumer_validators
tables.description: This table provides a list of consumer validators in the Cosmos ecosystem, which are responsible for validating transactions and verifying the integrity of the blockchain. It includes information about the providers and their associated validators.

columns.name: provider_address
columns.description: The address of the provider that is associated with the consumer validator.

columns.name: consumer_key_ed25519
columns.description: The public key of the consumer validator, used for signing transactions.

columns.name: power
columns.description: The power of the consumer validator, representing its voting weight in the network.

columns.name: rate
columns.description: The rate at which the consumer validator is paid for its services.

columns.name: consumer_power
columns.description: The total power of the consumer validator, including its stakes and delegations.

columns.name: consumer_commission_rate
columns.description: The commission rate charged by the consumer validator for its services.

columns.name: provider_commission_rate
columns.description: The commission rate charged by the provider for its services.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: The human-readable name of the provider or consumer validator.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the provider or consumer validator, which can be a public key or a name.

columns.name: website
columns.description: The website of the provider or consumer validator.

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: The contact information for security-related issues with the provider or consumer validator.

columns.name: details
columns.description: Any additional information about the provider or consumer validator.

columns.name: provider_operator_address
columns.description: The address of the operator of the provider.

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: A boolean indicating whether the provider or consumer validator is jailed, meaning it is unable to participate in the network.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the provider or consumer validator.

columns.name: provider_tokens
columns.description: The tokens held by the provider.

columns.name: provider_power
columns.description: The total power of the provider, including its stakes and delegations.

columns.name: validates_current_epoch
columns.description: A boolean indicating whether the consumer validator is currently validating transactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the data was retrieved.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the data was retrieved.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The address of the consumer validator.

tables.name: neutron_message_events
tables.description: This table provides an overview of message events from various blockchain sources within the Cosmos ecosystem. It offers insights into the timing and details of these events, allowing for a deeper understanding of the network's activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the message event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the message event was generated.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction that triggered the message event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within a transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within a message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred, such as a message creation or deletion.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes related to the event, including any relevant data or metadata.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to define the structure of the data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_redelegate
tables.description: This table contains information about validator redelegations within the Cosmos ecosystem. It tracks the redelegation of tokens from one validator to another, providing insights into the movement of tokens within the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the redelegation transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the redelegation transaction was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: src_validator
columns.description: The validator address from which tokens were redelegated.

columns.name: dst_validator
columns.description: The validator address to which tokens were redelegated.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens redelegated.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time at which the redelegation was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the redelegation data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_send
tables.description: This table represents a collection of transactions from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing a detailed view of the send operations that have taken place on the blockchain. It contains essential information about each transaction, including sender, receiver, and token details.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within its block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address that received the tokens in the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the database.

tables.name: neutron_slinky_prices
tables.description: Cosmos blockchain data related to validator voting and block information. This data is crucial for understanding the voting mechanics and block creation in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: validator_address
columns.description: Unique address of the validator who voted or participated in the block creation.

columns.name: validator_power
columns.description: The voting power of the validator, indicating their influence on the network.

columns.name: block_id_flag
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the block is valid or not.

columns.name: extension_signature
columns.description: Signature of the extension data associated with the block.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, indicating its position within the network.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created, indicating the time of its creation.

columns.name: vote_prices
columns.description: Prices of votes cast by the validator, influencing their voting power.

columns.name: ingested_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, indicating its freshness.

tables.name: neutron_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive record of transactions from the Cosmos ecosystem. Each transaction includes relevant metadata for auditing and analysis.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block within the Cosmos blockchain that this transaction was included in.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain that this transaction belongs to.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for this transaction within the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: A JSON object containing additional information about this transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A log message generated during the processing of this transaction.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A memo or note associated with this transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee paid for processing this transaction, expressed in a specific denomination.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The code returned by the Cosmos blockchain after processing this transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of this transaction within the block that it was included in.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The amount of gas consumed by this transaction during processing.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested for processing this transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when this transaction was ingested into the database.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store this transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the fee for processing this transaction.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the fee for processing this transaction.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the fee for processing this transaction.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be consumed by this transaction.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: A flag indicating whether this transaction was processed in single-sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: A JSON object containing multi-signature information for this transaction.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The height of the block where this transaction will timeout if not processed.

tables.name: neutron_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains transaction messages from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing a detailed view of blockchain activity. It offers insights into the type of transactions and the associated data.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction message within the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of transaction message (e.g., contract creation, contract call, etc.).

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual transaction message data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction message was ingested into the system.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to process the transaction message.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

tables.name: neutron_undelegate
tables.description: This table provides information on undelegation operations across Cosmos blockchain validators. It contains details about the transaction, sender, and validator involved in the undelegation process.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the undelegation transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the undelegation transaction was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique identifier of the transaction that initiated the undelegation process.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the validator who initiated the undelegation process.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The address of the validator being undelegated from.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens being undelegated from the validator.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens being undelegated.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time at which the undelegation process was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_vote
tables.description: This table contains information about votes from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the voting process on different proposals.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the vote transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the vote transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that contains the vote.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction that contains the vote.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message that contains the vote.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that cast the vote.

columns.name: proposal_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the proposal that the vote is for.

columns.name: option
columns.description: The option selected by the sender in the vote.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: neutron_wasm_contract_labels
tables.description: This table provides information about WASM contract labels from the Cosmos ecosystem, including block timestamps and contract interactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the contract label was ingested.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the contract label was ingested.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The hash of the transaction that triggered the contract label.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction that triggered the contract label within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that triggered the contract label.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that triggered the contract label.

columns.name: contract_address
columns.description: The address of the WASM contract that was labeled.

columns.name: action
columns.description: The action that triggered the contract label.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the contract label was ingested by the data pipeline.

tables.name: neutron_wasm_executed_actions
tables.description: This table contains a summary of all executed actions within WASM contracts across the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the actions taken on these contracts at each block.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the action was executed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was solved, indicating when the action was executed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash identifying the transaction that contained the executed action.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The position of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that contained the executed action.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The position of the action within the message that contained the executed action.

columns.name: contract_address
columns.description: The unique address of the WASM contract on which the action was executed.

columns.name: action
columns.description: A description of the action performed on the WASM contract.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the action was ingested into the database.
